channel.title: flight on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in flight on Barefoot Rob

item.title: flight delayed
item.description: … make the print before boarding started on my flight! So I walked back to the gate and blinked a couple times because no one was there! I didn’t miss it did I??? ohhh gate change information and 75 minute delay.. Wow! What other adventures can I get into in a whole hour plus??

item.title: 42 minutes to Dubai
item.description: 14:45 Sunday 31 December 2017 -02 I am certainly getting tired. I did not sleep the last 4 hours of the flight as planned. I kept working on Godot and then watched the last couple or three episodes of Lucifer season 2. The flight was scheduled to be 14 hours, so I have been awake about 17 hours since my last entry. Okay, yes I woke up at 20:47 and it is now 14:49 the next day.

item.title: flying home
item.description: 10:46 Monday 09 October 2017 JST As soon as I thought to write “flying home,” I got a little pang of guilt. Isn’t my home Houston? Anyway, the flight from Perth to Honkers was a bit long, but fine. I slept for most of the first six hours and then watched the movie CHiPs because it was listed as a comedy, but .. it was pretty dark if it was a comedy.

item.title: flyin
item.description: 10:19 Wednesday 12 October 2016 JST We took off ten minutes early, and I’ve just had a nice nap. Got several neat pictures on the way up, but I wonder if I’ll ever post them. Gonna work on date difference calculator. 10:53 Wednesday 12 October 2016 JST in-flight breakfast! ps: I’m nearly done with proof of concept of my days old counter, but I have just discovered the dateDiff library I snagged doesn’t allow dates from the 1800s.

item.title: near LA
item.description: 09:40 Friday 22 January 2016 PST We’re about 25 minutes out. Lin and I both slept well, so I’m pretty sure we’ll have no jet laggin’ issues. My sinus is quite itchy sneezy… while my mouth was chewing the grape that came with our breakfast, my nose was like, “time to sneeze!!” and I had to work hard to override it! I was thinking, “you guys want some grapes???”

item.title: Airplane to ConCon
item.description:
Con Con 9:20am Monday 3 August 1998
transcribed from my diary I'm in seat 24A of Continental flight 1989 about to leave for ConCon. Celine Dion's "My heart will go on" is playing quietly over the speakers as two boys with English accents talk with their parents behind me, including "if I sit heah, I con't see tha TV." This weekend I got all my planned activities complete, including transcribing all my SWUUSI journal entries, updating the Houston YRUU (pronounced "

item.title: Flight to ConCon
item.description:
Con Con flyin there Monday 3 August 1998
transcribed from my diary On the ground below I can see huge block letters of green (trees?) on brown dirt background: LUECKI I wonder what the heck it means (city name?) or where it is... We've been flying for about an hour and I'm seeing some intricate roadways that look like an old circuit board. Pretty cool, but the weird thing is they don't see to go anywhere.
